programme.title: O Irresistível Forasteiro, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Um estranho em uma cidade de gado ocidental se comporta com notável autoconfiança, estabelecendo-se como um homem a ser respeitado.

programme.title: O Céu Mandou Alguém, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: Após mais um assalto, três ladrões de banco fogem rumo ao deserto. Perseguidos pelo xerife Buck Sweet, eles encontram uma mulher no meio do nada.

programme.title: Ainda Me Chamam Campo Santo, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Os irmãos McIntire tiveram uma educação primorosa na Inglaterra, graças às riquezas que a fazenda de seu velho pai proporcionou.

programme.title: O Último Samurai do Oeste, (1973, Western)
programme.desc: O jovem e ambicioso pistoleiro conhecido como Ninguém, está de olho em ídolo, o Rei do Gatilho, conhecido como Jack Beauregard que já pensa em se aposentar.

programme.title: Raça Brava, (1980, Western)
programme.desc: No Velho Oeste Bill Tyler, um comerciante de peles, tenta achar com seu melhor amigo, Henry Frapp, o lendário vale conhecido pela enorme quantidade de animais para caçar.

programme.title: Django Atira Primeiro, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Django sai a procura de seu pai que teve a cabeça colocada à prêmio, e chega tarde demais, pois ele fora assassinado por um caçador de recompensas.

programme.title: Shalako, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Shalako está conduzindo uma expedição de caça em uma zona selvagem no Novo México.

programme.title: O Passado Não Perdoa, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A família Zachary é uma família rica e influente do Texas, comandada por Ben e sua mãe, além dos outros três filhos, dois meninos e Rachel, que é adotada.

programme.title: No Rastro da Morte, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Cowan procura pelo seu amigo de infância Catlow, mas revela-se que Cowan é um oficial de polícia e a relação entre ambos não será nada fácil. Catlow é um ladrão, que junto com seus homens, reuniu gado sem marcar e planeja vendê-lo em Abilene.

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Após os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de água na Terra, uma nave é enviada até Titã, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a missão de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: Refúgio do Silêncio, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Funcionários de uma empresa vão a um refúgio nas montanhas e descobrem o horror por trás do lugar.

programme.title: O Semideus, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a história aterrorizante do local. Não demora até que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: Armadas e Perigosas, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Quando um vigarista tenta passar a perna nessas quatro avós, elas acidentalmente o matam.

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Após os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de água na Terra, uma nave é enviada até Titã, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a missão de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: Refúgio do Silêncio, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Funcionários de uma empresa vão a um refúgio nas montanhas e descobrem o horror por trás do lugar.

programme.title: O Semideus, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a história aterrorizante do local. Não demora até que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: Como assaltar um banco, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Ruggero é um homem tranquilo, mas impulsivamente decide roubar um banco para provar que é corajoso o suficiente para sua ex-mulher, que o abandonou.

programme.title: Rumo ao Fim do Mundo, (2014, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Em meio a uma catástrofe biológica que ameaça destruir a raça humana, as histórias de três casais se cruzam quando eles são forçados a tomar decisões difíceis que definirão seu futuro.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: O feitiço da Casa Whaley, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Quando um guia de turismo invade a Casa Mais Assombrada dos Estados Unidos, um pouco de caça aos fantasmas amadores com amigos se transforma em mais horror do que eles jamais poderiam imaginar.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: O Palhaço, (2019, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Depois de comprar uma boneca, a vida de Lane piora quando amigos próximos e familiares começam a desaparecer.

programme.title: Tubarões de Gelo, (2016, Supernatural Sci-Fi)
programme.desc: Uma nova raça de tubarões vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estação de pesquisa do Ártico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Deep Web - Desejos Ocultos, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: DEEP WEB Desejos Ocultos conta a história de um hacker que é chantageado por um policial e, é obrigado a utilizar seus conhecimentos para viabilizar e vender lances de garotas sendo torturadas on line na quarta camada da DEEP WEB.

programme.title: Mortos Vivos, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: Um xerife deve resgatar uma família distante de uma montanha durante a erupção de um vulcão e lutar contra uma horda de zumbis cheios de lava trazidos à vida por uma maldição.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças, (2018, Creature Features)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: A Múmia Ressurge, (2021, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um grupo de estudantes de arqueologia desperta uma múmia antiga. Depois de ficarem presos em um loop temporal, a única maneira de escaparem é derrotar a múmia.

programme.title: Miuga entrega uma mensagem para Totosai. Ele diz que a Tessaiga ficará mais forte se cortar derrotar um poderoso youkai. O grupo procura então os youkais morcegos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mãe e os Sentimentos de Shiori

programme.title: O youkai morcego tenta destruir a aldeia junto com a mãe de Shiori. Inuyasha é bloqueado pela barreira da menina e não consegue derrotá-lo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Tessaiga Vermelha que Quebra a Barreira

programme.title: A tribo youkais Gatos do Fogo ataca do oeste. Seu objetivo é obter os fragmentos da Jóia de Agome, bem como se vingar de Sesshomaru e Inuyasha, filhos do grande cão youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Conspiração dos Quatro Youkais Gatos de Fogo

programme.title: Inuyasha corta a barreira e junto com o Kuga, eles entram no castelo. Enquanto isso, Mirok e Sango caíram sob um feitiço, e Agome está presa em uma prisão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Alvos são Sesshomaru e Inuyasha

programme.title: O Rei Pantera, o general da tribo Pantera, começa a se mover com o poder da Jóia. Inuyasha e Sesshomaru atacam a múmia. Enquanto isso, Kuga, Mirok e os outros levam Agome e os outros para um local seguro.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Gatos de Fogo e a Espada de Dois Caninos

programme.title: Sango é convidada a matar um youkai por um jovem senhor chamado Kuranosuke, que se apaixonou por ela seis anos atrás. Kuranosuke tem aparência, status e riqueza. Sango está confusa sobre como ela recusará sua proposta de casamento.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A Tessaiga está equipada com uma técnica que pode romper barreiras. Jaken planeja roubá-la de Inuyasha, mas seus planos fracassam continuamente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Plano de Jaken para Roubar Tessaiga

programme.title: Narak diz a Sesshomaru que ele devolverá Rin se ele matar Inuyasha, mas Sesshomaru se recusa e vai até o castelo dele. Enquanto isso, Agome detecta a presença da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Sesshomaru e o Sequestro de Rin

programme.title: Narak está tentando absorver Sesshomaru para que ele possa obter os poderes de um youkai completo. Mas Inuyasha rompe sua barreira e interfere. Quando Narak vê que o jogo foi virado, ele foge.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome retorna aos dias atuais. Ela está ocupada se preparando para um simulado de dois dias. Enquanto isso, Sango está preocupada com Kohaku, que foi levado por Kagura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Conexão Entre o Presente e a Época das Guerras

programme.title: Ayame, uma youkai loba, aparece diante de Kuga e diz a ele que é sua noiva. Mas Kuga é loucamente apaixonado por Agome. Em sua fuga, Kuga encontra o castelo de Narak. Ayame vai atrás dele e é atacada por um youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Youkai Loba e a Grande Promessa

programme.title: Ayame leva Kuga para parar a luta de seus companheiros. Mas ela não tem intenção de retornar para ele. O youkai que estava atrás dos fragmentos da Jóia ataca. Kuga luta para proteger Agome e Ayame.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Proposta de Casamento Super Veloz

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo conhecem uma senhora que é uma falsa exorcista. A fim de descobrir por que tantos youkais apareceram recentemente, eles vão ao Castelo que parece ser a origem desse problema.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Aumento da Energia Maligna; A Cabeça do Demônio

programme.title: Inuyasha luta contra o senhor do Castelo. Sango ouve que Mirok foi para o porão com a princesa e vai atrás dele. Agome encontra o cadáver da verdadeira princesa no quarto do lorde.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Enquanto procura por Narak, Kikyo conhece Kansuke, um velho bandido que está gravemente doente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo aceitam um trabalho para se livrar dos macacos, que estão destruindo campos. Eles encontram três macacos, Gon, Bun e Ken.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Três Youkais do Deus Macaco

programme.title: Agome pega um resfriado e retorna aos dias atuais. Inuyasha está preocupado com ela. Ele reúne muitos alimentos nutritivos derrotando vários youkais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Confronto Entre Inuyasha e Hojo

programme.title: O irmão mais novo de Agome, Sota, se apaixonou por Hitomi, uma colega de classe. Inicialmente, ele pede a Inuyasha um conselho, mas no final, ele decide dizer a ela que a ama com um plano orquestrado por Agome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Tesso, um youkai de rato que tem medo de gatos, se transforma em um curandeiro e persegue Kuroro. Inuyasha e seu grupo encontram aldeões que confundem Kirara com Kuroro e tentam expulsá-la.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Espiritualista Mistérioso e a Kirara Negra

programme.title: Kikyo foi trazida de volta à vida por uma das técnicas secretas de Urasue. Ela conhece Monju, que está na mesma situação. Monju não tem almas suficientes.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Em uma certa aldeia, Inuyasha e sua equipe estão cercados por aldeões que não gostam de Mirok. Quando eles perguntam por que, eles dizem que Mirok tem feito muitas más ações. Mirok diz que ele é inocente, e suspeita que isso seja obra de um impostor...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e sua equipe se encontram com Izumo, que está investigando o segredo da criação da Jóia. Eles ouvem que um youkai apareceu e vão investigar uma aldeia próxima.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 1

programme.title: Agome e os outros são sequestrados por youkais que estão usando falsas Jóias. Inuyasha vai salvá-los, mas Gyu-Oh fica em seu caminho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 2

programme.title: Os insetos venenosos de Narak aparecem. Sesshomaru vai atrás deles. Enquanto isso, Jaken é picado por um inseto venenoso e está morrendo. Rin fica com ele e tenta salvá-lo. Ela vai ao campo de Jinenji para obter um fruto do Sennenso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kirara desaparece e Sango está preocupada. Shippo deduz as razões de Kirara para desaparecer e culpa Inuyasha. Naquele momento, um som estrondoso vem da floresta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome é atraída para uma caverna por uma voz pedindo ajuda. Ao entrar ela encontra Kikyo, que não tem almas suficientes e enfraqueceu-se.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kikyo e Kagome Sozinhas Numa Caverna

programme.title: Ginta e Hakkaku brigam com Kuga e acabam trabalhando separadamente. Ao fazer isso, eles encontram o grupo de Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kuga e Sesshomaru, O Perigoso Confronto

programme.title: Garamaru, um youkai mariposa, prendeu Agome e os outros em um casulo e agora eles estão presos em seus pesadelos. Na vida real, Inuyasha está lutando sozinho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Pesadelo Real! A Luta na Floresta do Desespero

programme.title: A neve está caindo fora de época. Mirok é sequestrado por Koyuki, uma mulher misteriosa. Agome e os outros ouvem de um caçador e sua esposa sobre um youkai da neve. Quando eles vão procurá-lo, eles encontram Sango, que se perdeu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Sete Anos Depois; As Neves Eternas

programme.title: Um ogro gigante chamado Kyokotsu aparece nas montanhas ao norte e devora outros youkais como a tribo de lobos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Youkais Lobos são Atacados por um Zumbi

programme.title: O Exército dos Sete foi trazido de volta à vida. O calvário enviado para derrotá-los é dizimado pelo segundo mais forte, Yakotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A luta entre Yakotsu e Inuyasha é interrompida quando Mukotsu interfere. Mukotsu sequestra Agome para torná-la sua noiva. Mirok e Sango tentam salvá-la, mas o veneno de Mukotsu os impede de se mover.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango foram enfraquecidos pelo veneno de Mukotsu. Inuyasha tenta os ajudar.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Squalo deixa Giorno fora de combate. Narancia usa a habilidade de radar de seu Stand Aerosmith para localizar e destruir a ameaça que se aproxima.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para investigar o passado do chefe, Bucciarati e sua equipe embarcam para a Sardenha, mas um estranho usuário de Stand aparece antes da decolagem.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Sozinha na cabine e sob ataque, Trish recebe a ajuda repentina de uma entidade que se autodenomina Spicy Lady, seu próprio Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Em uma missão para localizar Trish na Sardenha a pedido do chefe, o leal subordinado Doppio encontra o traidor Risotto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Uma historinha do passado – "Meu Nome é Doppio"

programme.title: Ao perceber que Doppio é mais do que um simples membro de Passione, Risotto o ataca sistematicamente com a habilidade magnética de seu Stand, Metallic.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Decidido a identificar seu chefe, Abbacchio ativa seu Stand para revelar quem fotografou a mãe de Trish 15 anos antes.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Sob um céu que pode desabar a qualquer momento

programme.title: Depois de receber uma informação anônima sobre a identidade do chefe e como derrotá-lo, Bucciarati e sua equipe vão a Roma encontrar a pessoa que fez a ligação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para fugir do Stand carnívoro de Cioccolata, Green Tea, Bucciarati e Mista tentam arrumar um carro, mas Secco está determinado a impedir a fuga.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Cioccolata tenta eliminar civis inocentes com seu Stand usando um helicóptero, mas Giorno e Mista decidem derrubá-lo antes.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para impedir que Secco chegue ao Coliseu antes, Bucciarati o atrai para um duelo sob as ruas de Roma.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ferido demais para perceber quem o está ajudando, Bucciarati é levado ao Coliseu por Doppio, que revela sua verdadeira identidade à pessoa que o está esperando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando Emperor Crimson é disparado contra Polnareff, o Silver Chariot é perfurado pela flecha. Quem está dentro do Coliseu adormece de forma misteriosa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Com as almas trocadas entre si, Mista e os outros têm que dar um jeito de recuperar a flecha antes que Diavolo fique com ela.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando Requiem provoca mutação nas entidades ao seu redor, Giorno conclui que a alma de Diavolo deve estar possuindo um dos membros de sua equipe.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Apesar de seus esforços, a flecha cai nas mãos de Diavolo. Mas antes que o chefe possa perfurar seu próprio Stand com ela, Bucciarati intervém.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Stand de Giorno evolui para Golden Wind Requiem. Diavolo tenta anular seus ataques, mas uma nova e terrível realidade aguarda o chefe da máfia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ao investigar o suposto suicídio da filha do florista, Mista se depara com um usuário de Stand chamado Scolippi.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Após a morte de seu pai, Dio Brando entra para uma família aristocrática e jura para si mesmo que vai deixar o herdeiro deles, Jonathan “JoJo” Joestar, sem nada.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo conhece um líder de gangue chamado Speedwagon quando vai a Londres investigar o envenenamento de seu pai.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo enfrenta Dio após dar o antídoto ao pai. Durante a batalha, Dio decide usar a máscara de pedra.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo reencontra seu primeiro amor, Erina. Um homem chamado Will A. Zeppeli demonstra ter um estranho poder e diz que JoJo precisa destruir a máscara de pedra.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo e seus companheiros são emboscados por Dio e uma horda de zumbis depois de serem atraídos até um cemitério por um garoto chamado Poco.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O lendário cavaleiro Blueford ressuscita e confia sua espada a JoJo. Tarkus ataca JoJo com força avassaladora.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Zeppeli ataca Tarkus, mesmo sabendo de seu destino terrível. Em um último ato de coragem, ele usa as forças que lhe restam para repassar seus poderes ao sucessor, JoJo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo resgata a irmã de Poco. Dire, um amigo de Zeppeli, bate de frente com Dio. Com a espada de Blueford nas mãos, JoJo volta a enfrentar Dio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo e Erina embarcam em um cruzeiro para a lua de mel. Mas, para o espanto de JoJo, uma pessoa ligada a Dio aparece a bordo do navio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O ano é 1938. Em uma ruína mexicana, diversas máscaras de pedra são descobertas. Na cidade de Nova York, um jovem chamado Smokey recebe a ajuda de Joseph, o neto de JoJo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph enfrenta Straizo, que virou vampiro após trair seu amigo Speedwagon. Terminada a batalha, Straizo avisa sobre o Homem do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph é atacado por um dos homens de Stroheim na chegada ao México. Stroheim tenta despertar Santviento, o Homem do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph usa seu poder para tentar fugir de Santviento. Quando isso não dá certo, ele tenta expor seu inimigo à luz do sol para se salvar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph e Speedwagon conhecem Caesar, neto de Zeppeli, quando chegam a Roma após a descoberta de que existem outros Homens do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Homem do Pilar Wamuu fere Caesar Zeppeli durante uma luta feroz. Joseph revela a nova técnica que desenvolveu em segredo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Caesar leva Joseph até Veneza para conhecer sua mentora Lisa Lisa, que começa a treiná-lo com rigor para aprender a controlar seus poderes.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Lisa Lisa diz a Joseph que ele precisa da pedra chamada Super Aja para destruir os Homens do Pilar. Joseph e Caesar enfrentam outros mestres.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Congo, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Quando uma expedição desaparece no Congo, um grupo é enviado para procura-la, em uma aventura cheia de acontecimentos, tecnologia e muito suspense.

programme.title: Victor e o Segredo da Mansão do Crocodilo, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Quando Victor, um menino de 11 anos, muda para a velha mansão do tio avô, descobre que lá desapareceu uma jovem chamada Cecilia. Victor não terá dúvidas em seguir as pistas para encontrar a verdade, mesmo que tenha que enfrentar grandes aventuras.

programme.title: A História de Wim, (1998, Children)
programme.desc: Dois ex-presidiários tentam incriminar o detetive mocinho que os mandou para a prisão. No entanto, um grupo de crianças encerrou as operações dos gângsteres com a ajuda de alguns amigos do reino animal.

programme.title: Os Sete Corvos, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Baseado em dois contos de fadas dos irmãos Grimm - Os Sete Corvos e Os Seis Cisnes.

programme.desc: Quando uma expedição desaparece no Congo, um grupo é enviado para procura-la, em uma aventura cheia de acontecimentos, tecnologia e muito suspense.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliação, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China e na América, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Jet Li é Wong Fei-Hong, herói chinês que vai à América, é salvo por índios e luta contra a exploração de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a história de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Samurai X - O Inferno De Kyoto, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Kenshin Himura vai contra o puro mal Makoto Shishio que está tentando derrubar o governo Meiji. O destino do país está em jogo quando Kenshin Himura pega a espada que ele jurou nunca mais sacar.

programme.title: Sangue Oposto, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Dmitri e James, dois poderosos assassinos de elite contratados pelo governo, se reconectam após seu último trabalho no Sudeste Asiático.

programme.title: Don't Give Up The Ship, (1959, Comedy)
programme.desc: New bridegroom called to D.C. to explain what happened to a navy destroyer escort gone since WWII.

programme.title: The Errand Boy, (1961, Comedy)
programme.desc: Morty S. Tashman, under the guise of studio mail clerk, is to roam the lot and then report back to the boss with any questionable or dishonest activities. But virtually all of the shenanigans and escapades Morty uncovers are ones of his own doing!

programme.title: Who's Minding The Store?, (1963, Comedy)
programme.desc: An incompetent young man is given a job in a department store by his girlfriend's mother, who hopes to put an end to their romance.

programme.title: Visit To A Small Planet, (1960, Comedy)
programme.desc: Curious about humans, Lewis parks his spaceship in the backyard of a skeptic, and both get a glimpse of a world they'll never forget! Based on the play by Gore Vidal.

programme.title: The Bellboy, (1960, Comedy)
programme.desc: Lewis stars as Stanley, a non-speaking, bumbling bellhop at the ritzy Fontainebleau Hotel in Florida’s Miami Beach. Guests may come and guests may go, but Stanley is on duty day after day at the posh resort, encountering all sorts of catastrophes.

programme.title: My Friend Irma, (1949, Comedy)
programme.desc: A slapsticky saga related by a comparatively bright brunette dishing the dirt about her dumb blonde roommate. Dean Martin and Jerry Lewis's movie debut.

programme.title: My Friend Irma Goes West, (1950, Comedy)
programme.desc: Singer Steve, friend Seymour and fiance Jane, along with her dizzy blonde room mate Irma, have a series of misadventures on a California-bound train and end up involved with a gang of murderous gangsters in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Oklahoma!, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

programme.title: Flower Drum Song, (1961, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: A young woman arrives in San Francisco's Chinatown from Hong Kong with the intention of marrying a rakish nightclub owner, unaware he is involved with one of his singers.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Death Warrant, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude van Damme ("Bloodsport", "Cyborg") is a veteran undercover cop posing as an inmate in a dangerously corrupt state prison.

programme.title: Double Impact, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Identical twins are separated at six months and raised on different continents. They reunite twenty-five years later to avenge the murder of their parents and reclaim their stolen family fortune.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)

programme.desc: The story of a minor-league North Carolina baseball team (the Triple A Durham Bulls) and its attentive, intelligent groupie who feels it is her mission to live with one young player per season and help him mature.

programme.title: 48 Hrs., (1982, Action)
programme.desc: Nolte is a rough-edged cop after two vicious cop-killers. He can't do it without the help of smooth Murphy, who is serving time for a half-million dollar robbery.

programme.title: Another 48 Hrs., (1989, Action)

programme.title: Double Jeopardy, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Libby Parsons, who discovers that the husband she’s convicted of murdering staged his own “death” and framed her for the crime. Released on parole, she skips town to find him–and that puts parole officer Travis Lehman on her trail.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Crime)
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter Francis Ford Coppola's definitive new edit and restoration of THE GODFATHER: PART III, with remastered picture and sound. Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: Robocop, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy (Joel Kinnaman) -- a loving husband, father and good cop -- is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

programme.title: Rollerball, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan stars as a rollerball champ in this fast-hitting, action- packed glimpse of a future where a brutal, no-holds-barred sport takes the place of war, and murder is just part of the game.

programme.title: Rollerball, (2002, Action)

programme.title: Let The Right One In, (2008, Horror)

programme.title: Let Me In (2010), (2011, Horror)

programme.title: Death Wish, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: When his wife (Elisabeth Shue) and daughter (Camila Morrone) are savagely assaulted, an enraged doctor (Bruce Willis) seeks his own justice, becoming part deadly avenger and part guardian angel in director Eli Roth's reinvention of the classic!

programme.desc: With the tournament on the line, Yusei must find a way to defeat Halldor before the three Nordic Gods knock his life points down to nothing!

programme.title: Carrot stows away! And settles in with the Straw Hats as they make their way to rescue Sanji! Meanwhile, in the Sakura Kingdom, Dalton and Kureha are getting ready for the Reverie so as their former enemy in his newly-built kingdom…
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Reverie! Rebecca and the Sakura Kingdom!

programme.title: News of the raid on the Revolutionary Army reaches Luffy! But that's the least of their worries as they face a storm and a sudden lack of provisions! Meanwhile, Emperor Kaido fumes with anger at the reckless generation of upstarts!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kaido Returns! An Imminent Threat to the Worst Generation!

programme.title: Sneaking in to the Navy island facility to replenish their food supply, Luffy and the others risk being caught out in the open! Will their infamy make them easy to spot by the hotheaded Navy recruits around them?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hungry Front! Luffy and the Navy Rookies!

programme.title: The jig is up as Luffy and the others make a daring dash to avoid the furious Navy! Can they escape without having to turn to fight - and after they've had a chance to raid the cabinets for food?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Implacable Three! A Big Chase After the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Making a mad dash for the Submerge with the food they stole, Luffy and the others have to get through some of the Navy's upstart soldiers! Grount, whose arm holds incredible power, summons his training to challenge Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Devil's Fist! A Show Down! Luffy vs. Grount!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji's Homecoming! Into Big Mom's Territory!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Totto Land! Emperor Big Mom Appears!

programme.title: The Straw Hats confront Pudding - the fiancée of Sanji! But when they challenge her for Sanji's heart, her answer shocks them! Meanwhile, an ominous and mysterious message may spell doom for the Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Emperor's Daughter! Sanji's fiancée - Pudding!

programme.title: The dangerous waters around the Whole Cake Island harbor terrifying creatures that pose a challenge for the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Mama slips into a bout of her sickness and ravages her own land in search of a specific pastry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Massive Attack! Mom's Hunger Pangs!

programme.title: Big Mom rampages through the Whole Cake Island in search for sweets - but when the kitchen can't prepare them fast enough, her own son steps in to curb the carnage, with deadly results.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Capital City Falls?! Big Mom and Jimbei!

programme.title: As the Straw Hats draw closer to the Whole Cake Island, Pedro shares his sordid past in Big Mom's territory - and hatches a plan to win back Sanji and take an item of great worth from the Emperor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Emperor's Castle! Arriving at the Whole Cake Island!

programme.title: Brook and Pedro head out in a submersible to infiltrate Big Mom's stronghold! Meanwhile, Luffy, Nami, Chopper and Carrot head into the island chasing the image of Sanji, only to be distracted by the endless supply of sweets and a second Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Mysterious Forest Full of Candies! Luffy vs. Luffy?!

programme.title: Lost in the bewildering woods and chasing after Sanji, Nami and the others find there's more than meets the eye in this upside down part of the Whole Cake Island! Meanwhile, Sanji confronts his brother!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mom's Assassin! Luffy and the Seducing Woods!

programme.title: Luffy continues to move through the mysterious and dangerous woods, unaware of the danger that lurks in the trees! Meanwhile, Sanji confronts his father as the wounds of his childhood are laid bare!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Seafaring Kingdom! Germa's King Judge!

programme.title: Sanji faces off against his father in a duel! His powerful kicks aim at protecting his hands, but the Germa Family has more in store for him yet! Meanwhile, Luffy goes deeper into the Seducing Woods and falls for their powerful illusions!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle Between Father and Son! Judge vs. Sanji!

programme.title: Big Mom has Caesar Clown at her whims - and despite his bilking her out of countless amounts of money - she is ready to continue her pursuit of maniacal world control!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Giant Ambition! Big Mom and Caesar!

programme.title: Finally, Nami finds Luffy and recounts her harrowing tale of battling Brulee! Meanwhile, the mysterious half-buried man comes clean about his true identity! But this must all be put aside when one of Mom's most powerful generals comes calling!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Land of Souls! Mom's Fatal Ability!

programme.title: The identity of the enigmatic Pound, the man half-buried in the woods, is revealed, but his deep connection to Big Mom might not be enough to save him! Nami's past exploits, however, hold the key to keeping Mom's minions at bay!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Top Officer! The Sweet 3 General Cracker Appears!

programme.title: Luffy squares off against Cracker, one of the Sweet 3 Generals, as Nami learns the truth about others in the Worst Generation who have come before to challenge Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Enemy Worth 800 million! Luffy vs. Thousand Armed Cracker!

programme.title: Luffy continues to fight against Cracker, whose powers to manipulate his surroundings may prove more troublesome than he had thought! Meanwhile, Brook and Pedro infiltrate the Whole Cake Island - and must hatch a plan to avoid getting caught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An All-out Duel! Gear Four vs. the Bis-Bis Ability

programme.title: The wind starts to go out of Luffy's sails as he fights an endless army of Biscuit Warriors! Meanwhile, the oldest two Vinsmoke brothers come home from a war to see their long-missing young brother Sanji.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The First and the Second Join! The Vinsmoke Family!

programme.title: Luffy starts to run out of steam as the Biscuit Warriors keep multiplying! If he can buy himself 10 minutes to recharge…
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Benefactor's Life! Sanji and Owner Zeff!

programme.title: Luffy needs just 10 minutes to recharge! Nami comes to rescue with the help of the Homies! Meanwhile, Sanji learns the terrible truth of Germa's power - and his father's dark history!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Angry Sanji! The Secret of Germa 66!

programme.title: Nami challenges Cracker on her own! During the all-out fight, she loses her advantage and is close to defeat. Can Luffy bounce back in time? Meanwhile, Sanji's tragic childhood is made clear.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Past that He Let Go of! Vinsmoke Sanji!

programme.title: The terrible history of Sanji's family continue to unfold. From a rare moment of compassion, he is able to escape, only to face his father's cruelty before setting out on his own.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the East Blue! Sanji's Resolute Departure!

programme.title: Luffy is in an all-out, all-you-can-eat battle! As Cracker's endless stream of Biscuit Warriors marches on, Luffy's endless appetite is put to the test. Meanwhile, Reiju helps Sanji to straighten himself out before he meets his fiancée.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle of Limits! Luffy and the Infinite Biscuits!

programme.title: Luffy needs to think fast in order to turn the battle in his favor - filled with biscuits, he debuts a new Gear Four attack that has lasting repercussions! Meanwhile, Chopper and Carrot find Sanji's reflection, but can they get a message to him in time?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Power of Satiety! A New Gear Four Form - Tank Man!

programme.title: Luffy finally catches up with Sanji! However, as a happy past plays before his eyes in which he, Sanji, and the crew deepened their bonds, a new page is turning in the history of the Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heartbreaking Duel! Luffy vs Sanji! - Part 1

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #15: Operation: Return the Treasure
programme.desc: Lupin sets his sights on the legendary Trick Diamond, stolen by his late rival Mark Williams. Instead of finding the diamond, Fujiko relays Mark's dying challenge: return all the other treasures he stole to reveal the location of the gem.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #16: Swallowtail Tatoo
programme.desc: A mysterious criminal captures Lupin and Fujiko with a very specific order: in order to save Fujiko's life, Lupin must infiltrate a high-security museum and steal the Bull's Eye jewel. One little problem: the jewel is cursed to kill anyone who steals it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's new target is the digital currency gained from the transactions made on this site. Lupin sneaks into a massive high-security server facility, known as the "twin towers". Lupin greets the guard to the key, a young girl and skilled hacker "Ami".
programme.sub-title: The Girl in the Twin Towers

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Hunt down the greatest thief of our times, Lupin III!" The Marco Polo executives have set a trap in the form of the Lupin Game. This has people all over the world tracking down Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shinpei Mayama, the Rat Clan, Union Mama... the all-stars of assassination, from all over the world, suddenly come after Lupin. They're players in a new game started by the executives of Marco Polo: Happy Deathday.
programme.sub-title: The Killers Gather in the Wasteland

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko smiles deviously as she points her gun at Lupin, when Zenigata arrives to save him and Ami. They get into the inspector's car which takes off, but it's soon attacked by soldiers who are trying to cash in the price on Lupin's head.
programme.sub-title: Zenigata's Pride and the Desert Dust

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot in the head by a drone fighter. With the death of its target, the Lupin Game is concluded. Time passes, and people forget about the game. Released from his duty of hunting Lupin, Ami now lives with Zenigata, when one day Goemon visits her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: The "Smart Safe" has come to the Greater Tokyo Bank. Lupin is goaded by Fujiko and Jigen to try and crack the technological wonder. What can he do against this peculiarly secure safe?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is hired by Gaston to retrieve a painting, and manages to do so easily enough... except the painting has a strange resemblance to a real Picasso piece, forcing Lupin to examine the truth behind why he was hired.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin visits Gaston's grave. There he meets the elderly Camille, with who he goes out for a drink when the pub's phone begins to ring. On the other end of the line is the supposedly dead Gaston.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot, and Albert gets his hands on the notebook. Lupin is saved by Jigen and Goemon and manages to survive his injuries under care. He then explains his past with Albert and how they know each other.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: After learning the shocking truth about Jose's terrifying plot, Lupin heads to Jose's headquarters with Albert, his old thieving comrade. Jigen and Goemon fight off the heaviest opposition while Lupin and Albert head into the heart of the enemy territory.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: To steal the fortune of the Drug King Pablo, the gang heads to South America with Fujiko. As Fujiko distracts the target, Lupin picks off the remains of Pablo's guards while making his way through the jungle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: In a rural town in France, full of cosplayers. Within the town celebrating a pop-cultural event is Goemon. Next to the inn, he decides to keep watch at is Chloé's Bistro. Chloé is exactly the woman Goemon was looking for Lupin's current target.
programme.sub-title: The Extravagance of Goemon Ishikawa XIII

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Having enrolled at the Annecy School for Girls, Ami encounters a strange girl in the garden who aims her bow at a crow. The girl is Dolma, the princess of the Kingdom of Padar. Having no friends, Ami finds herself opening up to the odd Dolma.
programme.sub-title: The Bow, The Princess, and the Terrorist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Princess Dolma, please save Padar." With that request, Dolma is taken home. Lupin follows shortly, and Ami decides to accompany Fujiko to Padar in order to save Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is pierced by Dolma's arrow. Ami and Fujiko take Lupin and escape, hiding in a deserted building. The three of them decide to flee, with Lupin badly injured.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Padar sinks into chaos because of the civil war, but things take a sudden turn when the Shake Hands company gets involved. A proclamation by the king is posted online, proving him to be alive.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "I want you to find out who killed my husband." Three years ago, someone shot Count Maupassant to death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shortly after moving into the hideout in Riquewihr, Lupin wakes up to a broken bathroom. After bickering with Jigen for access to the bathroom, Fujiko appears.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A string of indiscriminate shootings has struck Northern Africa. They're actually a challenge to Lupin from the wealthy Zylberstein.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's gang visits the Northern Angel, on the outskirts of Russia. What at first seems like a snowy, dull town turns out to be full of riches to the joy of the group of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Peoplelog"--a social media service that uses AI to analyze the incredible amount of data on the internet, allowing you to learn all about a person.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko has been captured. She's being held at Orig Island, the headquarters of Shake Hands. Lupin and the gang, including Ami, head there to find her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Papa! Save Lupin!" Ami is reunited with her long-last father. But Enzo is already obsessed with using Peoplelog to save the world.
programme.sub-title: Just Then, An Old Buddy Said Something

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin III has vanished from the internet. Meanwhile, the man himself is updating Peoplelog with confidential information that begins to throw the world into chaos.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin receives an invitation to join a race by Mr. X. Jigen and Goemon questions Lupin's willingness to join despite knowing it's a trap, but Lupin has his eyes on the Golden Statue rumored to be in a mansion near the race course.
programme.sub-title: 50th Anniversary Special - Is Lupin Still Burning?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #17: Tactics Of Angels
programme.desc: Lupin faces his toughest opponents yet! Four women known as the Bloody Angels are after the strange metallic sphere he stole from Area 51. To get their hands on potential alien technology, they're willing to do anything.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Robocop, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy (Joel Kinnaman) -- a loving husband, father and good cop -- is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: The Dark Command, (1940, Drama)
programme.desc: A Civil War tale based on the exploits of the notorious outlaw William Quantrill. A courageous sheriff stands up to Quantrill and his band of guerrillas pillaging the countryside in Civil War-torn Kansas, and stops the raids.

programme.title: Pardners, (1956, Drama)
programme.desc: A rich momma's boy returns west with the son of his murdered father's partner to foil a gang trying to gain control of his family ranch. They accidentally clean up the town.

programme.title: Alias Jesse James, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: In this hilarious western spoof, insurance broker Milford Farnsworth (Bob Hope) unwittingly sells a life insurance policy worth $100,000 to the infamous Jesse James. Now, he has to figure out how to keep the deadliest outlaw in history alive!

programme.title: Along Came Jones, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: Gary Cooper gives a marvelous, tongue-in-cheek performance as a fumble-fingered cowpoke who is mistaken for a notorious bandit and almost gets killed by both sides of the law...all while managing to capture the attention of Loretta Young.

programme.title: Goin' South, (1978, Western)
programme.desc: JACK NICHOLSON plays Henry Moon, a third-rate outlaw, in this romantic comedy set in the 1860s.

programme.title: Apache Country, (1952, Drama)
programme.desc: Cavalry scouts Gene Autry & Pat Buttram are ordered to break up a ring which uses raids to cover up its activities. Carolina Cotton assists Gene and Pat, while seeking revenge against the gang leader.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Action)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: Adios, Sabata, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Under the brutal rule of garrison leader Col. Skimmel, a group of Mexican revolutionaries hire gunslinger Sabata (Yul Brynner) to rob a transport of gold in order to buy weapons. But the Colonel has other plans...taking the gold for himself.

programme.title: Return of Sabata, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: The great Lee Van Cleef ('Death Rides a Horse') returns as the famous freewheeling gunslinger Sabata. In this third and final go-round for the enigmatic sharpshooter, Sabata seeks revenge when a band of desperadoes bilks him out of $5,000.

programme.title: Disturbia, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Living under three months' house arrest, Kale Brecht (Shia LaBeouf, Transformers) passes his days spying on the neighbors. It's all fun and games until things take a horrifying turn for the worse.

programme.title: World Trade Center, (2006, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage and Michael Peña star as two New York City Port Authority policemen who were trapped in the rubble of September 11, 2001.

programme.title: The Legend of Bagger Vance, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: A disillusioned war veteran, Rannulph Junah, agrees to play a game of golf. He finds the game futile until his caddy, Bagger Vance, teaches him the secret of the authentic golf stroke.

programme.title: Every story and battle from the first half of the season comes crashing together in this action-packed, emotional mid-season finale.

programme.title: Daryl finds himself in bad company as his group heads to the Hilltop; Maggie makes difficult decisions at the Hilltop; Gabriel's faith becomes tested.

programme.title: Hilltop's leadership faces a difficult dilemma after the arrival of unexpected visitors; Rick comes face to face with an adversary.

programme.title: Trouble arises when unexpected visitors arrive at the Hilltop and the community is thrust into action; heartbreaking discoveries are made.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon attempts to free Endymion from Queen Beryl’s control. Sailor Moon is forced to fight the man she loves.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Eternal Wish: A Brand New Life

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Having lost all memory of being Sailor Moon, Usagi now lives her life as an ordinary girl.
programme.sub-title: Moon Returns: The Mysterious Aliens Appear

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon finds herself facing new enemies from outer space. The two aliens disguise themselves as humans to go after other human energy.
programme.sub-title: For Love and for Justice: Sailor Guardians Once Again

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi, Mako, and Ami see a boy attacked by one of Ail and An’s Cardian monsters. To Mako’s surprise, the boy turns out to be her childhood friend.
programme.sub-title: For Whom Is the White Rose? The Moonlight Knight Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi goes to a virtual reality arcade in the Juban District, where she unexpectedly runs into Mamoru, as well as Seijuro and Natsumi.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Crisis: The Tiara Stops Working

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends are enjoying the cherry blossoms when the Cardian Leshy attacks. The Sailor Guardians are caught.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako befriends a little girl named Mie who is a huge fan of Sailor Moon. Meanwhile, Ail and An send a Cardian to steal energy from young children.
programme.sub-title: The Targeted Kindergarteners: Venus to the Rescue

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Mamoru find themselves looking after a baby boy while his mother is recovering from having her energy stolen by a Cardian.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A school festival is going to be held at T.A. Girls’ Academy, which Rei attends. Usagi and Ami go to check up on her.
programme.sub-title: The School Festival Is for Me?! Queen Rei's Song

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami and Makoto are trying to figure out who the Moonlight Knight is. Makoto volunteers to investigate by getting closer to Seijuro.
programme.sub-title: Is Seijuro the Moonlight Knight? Mako on Fire

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls get into an argument over who gets to play Snow White in the upcoming play with Mamoru.
programme.sub-title: Steal a Kiss from Mamoru: An's Project Snow White

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Natsumi both get detention after angering Ms. Haruna during class. The two start working on their assignment when a Cardian shows up.
programme.sub-title: After-School Trouble: Usagi Is a Target

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ail and An learn that the Makai Tree is beginning to die. Usagi and her friends visit Natsumi after hearing that Natsumi is not feeling well.
programme.sub-title: Disconnecting Love: The Raging Makai Tree

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: While visiting Seijuro and Natsumi's apartment, Usagi and Mamoru come under attack by the Makai Tree.
programme.sub-title: True Love Awakens: The Makai Tree's Secret

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A mysterious girl suddenly falls down from the sky. Calling herself 'Usagi,' the girl demands Usagi to tell her where the Silver Crystal is.
programme.sub-title: Angel or Devil? The Mysterious Girl from the Sky

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi wakes up to find that Chibi-Usa has gone missing. Meeting up with Mamoru, the two search for Chibi-Usa, finding her alone at the park.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Devastated: Mamoru Declares a Break-Up

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami is offered a chance to study abroad in Germany. Knowing how important this is to her, Usagi and the others urge Ami to accept the offer.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei's grandfather is upset that Hikawa Shrine has had fewer female visitors lately. He then decides to retire as head priest to start a new business.
programme.sub-title: Women Must Be Strong and Beautiful: Rei's New Special Technique

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rubeus sends down Petz and her Droid to search and capture Chibi-Usa. Chibi-Usa is calling someone telling her she wants to go home.
programme.sub-title: In Search of the Silver Crystal: Chibi-Usa's Secret

programme.title: Sailor Moon
